promptPrefix:
[PROMPT]

so above is the written update of a tv serial you have to Rewrite above article in a way that it shouldnt be looked like it copied from somewhere, dont add subehadigs use short paragraphs consists of maximum 3-4 sentences, use following instructions to rewrite it:
Writing Style:
The writing style should be engaging, descriptive, and narrative-driven. Try to incorporate emotions and inner thoughts of the characters to make the article more captivating. Use a conversational tone to connect with the readers and make the story flow smoothly.

Tone:
Maintain a balance between seriousness and lightness in the tone. The article should capture the emotional turmoil and conflicts faced by the characters while also having moments of humor, if appropriate. Emphasize the highs and lows of the situation to keep the readers engaged.

Language:
Please use simple and accessible language throughout the article. The aim is to ensure that the readers can easily follow the story without any difficulty. Avoid complex sentence structures and excessive jargon. Remember to convey the emotions and thoughts of the characters effectively to create an immersive experience for the readers.
Grammar:
Pay close attention to grammar , punctuation, and sentence structure. Ensure that the sentences are properly constructed and free from grammatical errors. Proofread the article thoroughly to eliminate any spelling mistakes or typos. 

Additionally, please aim for consistency in tense and use present tense for the narrative, as demonstrated in the example article. This will help maintain a sense of immediacy and keep the readers engaged.

use a complete diffrent layout for the article dont use same as the original article,
remember dont make any imaginary story just rewrite the given article.[TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Rewriter
